message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: now you won't.
Him: he's not really the social media kind of guy ngl.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: Bet you can't even post without a filter lol.
Him: Filters are the new reality, haven't you heard? #NoFilterNeededWhenYouHavePersonality

CONVERSATION 3
Her: You probably don't even know how to go live.
Him: Live is for people who can't edit. I keep it 💯 in the highlights.

CONVERSATION 4
Her: You're not one of those who post gym selfies, right? Cringe.
Him: Only flex I need is my brain muscles outsmarting the algorithm.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: Don't tell me you're gonna slide into DMs with that weak game.
Him: Game so strong, I'm the one getting slid into. Checkmate. 😉
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : now you won't.  
        Him : Him : he's not really the social media kind of guy ngl. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
